channel.title: postgres on Slices of a hacker's mind
channel.description: Recent content in postgres on Slices of a hacker's mind

item.title: Postgresql User Login
item.description: For the Hedgedoc migration, I had to create a new role and forgot to add the necessary permissions to allow this role to login.

item.title: TTRSS to Docker[Part two]
item.description: In the previous post we got a TinyTiny-RSS Feedreader running in a docker environment.

item.title: MySQL to Postgresql
item.description: I dislike MySQL. I never did like it, since Oracle bought Sun it starting to become more then just disliking it. I prefer to work with Postgresql. I want to migrate some of my MySQL DB to Postgresql.
